Articles.Content:
Something weird happened when I tried to test out a plane on my modded install. I was screwing around with the OPT plane pack and Nertea's Mk4 system. I built a plane with mk4 fuselage, mapped the controls (I am using NEAR), launched, and none of the surfaces would actuate. I was fighting to control the vessel with engine gimballing but with NEAR on, there's no way that was going to end well.

Repro steps near as I can tell:

Build a plane

Map control surfaces

launch

watch your elevons not respond to input

Disclaimer: These are stock parts failing to work in the presence of mods. My gamedata folder is massive and troubleshooting it takes a small eternity. I am actively working to nail down the interaction. If anyone knows any combinations that may induce this, I'm all ears as it makes my life considerably easier.

Two smaller non-detrimental issues I had: Something is messing with the texture of the turbojet engine making it look terrible. the OPT pack radial engine mount surface attach is broken. Unclear if this is a mod oversight or an interaction bug. Testing pending.

Sorry for such a vague report. I'll have some updates with possible interactions as soon as I can. In the meantime, here's a list of my mods. This was not compiled for troubleshooting so it does NOT include bundled dependencies.

Atmospheric Sound Enhancement

Adjustable Landing Gear

Astronomer's Visual Pack

CollisionFX

Community Tech Tree

CoolRockets

DMagic Orbital Science

EditorExtensions

Raster Prop Monitor

KSI MFD replacement for RPM

KerbQuake

Kethane

Karbonite

KW Rocketry

Mark IV Spaceplane System

Talisar Cargo Transport Solutions

HotRockets Particle Effects

NEAR

Near Future Collection by Nertea

OPT Spaceplane System

Taurus HCV & Service Module

RCS Sounds

RLA Stockalike

SelectRoot

Simple Part Organizer

Station Parts Expansion

Mk 2 Nosecone

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Tweakable Everything

USI Freight Transport Solutions

VesselView

Background Processing
